# PageBrief: Global Header

## Build Context
- Built in DIVI Theme Builder (not per-page JSON)
- Built FIRST before any page content
- Persists across all 20 pages

## Specification

| Element | Specification |
|---------|---------------|
| Logo | DigiWin logo, left-aligned, links to Home |
| Navigation | Home · Products · Industries · Partner Program · Resources · About Us |
| CTA Button | "Request a Demo" — #00AFF0 background, white text, right-aligned |
| Language Selector | EN / TH toggle (if bilingual v1) — may omit for v1 |
| Behavior | Sticky on scroll, white background with subtle shadow |

## Design System
- Primary Blue: #00AFF0 (CTA button)
- Dark Navy: #000864 (can be used for text)
- White background: #FFFFFF
- Text Dark: #333333

## DIVI Implementation
- Use DIVI Theme Builder → Global Header
- Menu module for navigation
- Button module for CTA
- Image module for logo

## Reference
- Model after SYSPRO.com header pattern: horizontal megamenu with dropdowns
- Clean, minimal, sticky behavior
